title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project options not always available in Navigator
description:
Bug 2529 - Open/Close project options not always available in Navigator (1GFKW5S)

Steps to reproduce:
1. Select both P1 and P2.

Observed behavior:
- The Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not.

Expected behavior:
- Both the Open Project and Close Project options should be available in the Navigator menu when selecting multiple projects.
